content: my crochet cactus coaster pattern is looking sharp but i promise these cactus coasters won t hurt when you touch them **materials** ▢lily sugar n cream cotton yarn - hot green ▢lily sugar n cream cotton yarn - white ▢lily sugar n cream cotton yarn - rose pink ▢4 5mm crochet hook ▢tapestry needle **abbreviations us terms ** magic_ring - magic_ring chains - chain single_crochet - single_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet triple crochet - treble_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch increase - increase
